name: emilrex.com
body:
# About Me
***
Hi there!

My name is Emil and this site is where I try to document any noteworthy projects I've worked on. I was actually going to make a blog with [jekyll](http://jekyllrb.com/), but that seemed like overkill. In any case, here it is and here you are so let me tell you a bit about myself.

I am from Denmark originally, but I have spent most of my life abroad. I have lived in the US for the past eight years and recently moved to New York City to study at New York University. I enjoy writing beautiful code and learning everything I can about technology. I also have the privilege of working as a Data Engineer at [enigma.io](http://enigma.io/) where I get to play with data and python all day. 

I hope that you find some of projects interesting and perhaps even useful.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
